ingredients.title: For the Shake
ingredients.list:
500ml skimmed milk
50g milk cream, fresh
1 tsp sugar
1 cup water

ingredients.title: For toppings
ingredients.list:
1 Pineapple, small
1 Apple, medium size
200g black grapes
2 tbsp sugar
1 tsp vanilla essence
12 strawberries, medium sized
